TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MainMenu extends System.Windows.Forms.Menu

span.span: Represents the menu structure of a form.

summary.span: 尽管 替换了早期版本的 控件并添加了功能；但是也可选择保留 以备向后兼容和将来使用。

span.span: Although replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件表示窗体的菜单结构的容器。The control represents the container for the menu structure of a form. 菜单由 对象组成，这些对象表示菜单结构中的各个菜单命令。A menu is composed of objects that represent the individual menu commands in the menu structure. 每个 都可以是应用程序的命令或其他子菜单项的父菜单。Each can be a command for your application or a parent menu for other submenu items. 若要将 绑定到将显示它的 ，请将 分配给 的 属性。To bind the to the that will display it, assign the to the property of the . 对于将支持多种语言的应用程序，可以使用 属性以从右向左显示菜单的文本，以支持阿拉伯语等语言。For applications that will have support for multiple languages, you can use the property to display the text of the menu from right to left to support languages such as Arabic. 可以创建不同的 对象来表示窗体的不同菜单结构。You can create different objects to represent different menu structures for your form. 如果要重用特定 中包含的菜单结构，可以使用其 方法来创建副本。If you want to reuse the menu structure contained in a specific , you can use its method to create a copy. 获得菜单结构副本后，您可以对新的菜单结构进行适当的修改。Once you have a copy of the menu structure, you can make the appropriate modifications for your new menu structure. > [!NOTE] > 如果粘贴到的窗体中未定义菜单项，则在设计器中从一种窗体剪切和粘贴菜单项可能无法按预期方式工作。Cutting and pasting menu items from one form to another in the designer might not work as expected if the form you are pasting into has no menu items defined. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建 ，并将两个 对象分配给 ，并将其绑定到窗体。The following code example creates a , assigns two objects to the and binds it to a form. 此示例要求创建一个名为 `Form1`的 。This example requires that you have a created that is named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[Classic MainMenu.MainMenu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.MainMenu Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MainMenu.MainMenu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.MainMenu Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MainMenu.MainMenu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.MainMenu Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: MenuStrip Control (Windows Forms)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的构造函数创建一个没有任何指定 对象的 。This version of the constructor creates a without any specified objects. 若要向控件添加菜单项，请使用此构造函数的另一个版本，该版本接受 对象的数组作为其参数，或使用 属性的 方法。To add menu items to the control use the other version of this constructor that accepts an array of objects as its parameter or use the method of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建 ，并将两个 对象分配给 ，并将其绑定到窗体。The following code example creates a , assigns two objects to the and binds it to a form. 此示例要求创建一个名为 `Form1`的 。This example requires that you have a created that is named `Form1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此构造函数在创建时将 对象数组分配给 。You can use this constructor to assign an array of objects to the at the time of its creation. 创建 后，可以使用 属性的 方法将其他 对象添加到 。After the has been created you can add additional objects to the using the method of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建 ，并使用此版本的构造函数将两个 对象分配给 。The following code example creates a , and assigns two objects to the using this version of the constructor. 然后，该示例将 绑定到 。The example then binds the to a . 此示例要求创建一个名为 `Form1`的 。This example requires that you have a created that is named `Form1`. summary.span: 创建一个新 ，它是当前 的副本。

span.span: Creates a new that is a duplicate of the current .
A that represents the cloned menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此方法创建存储在 中的菜单结构的副本。You can use this method to create a copy of the menu structure stored in a . 您可以使用此方法将存储在 中的菜单结构作为新 的基础。You can use this method to reuse the menu structure stored in a as the foundation for a new . 例如，如果想要创建具有与现有 相同的菜单项的菜单结构，但同时还添加了其他 对象，则可以使用 方法创建原始 的副本，然后将新的 对象添加到克隆的 中。For example, if you want to create a menu structure that has the same menu items as an existing but will also have additional objects added to it, you can use the method to create a copy of the original and then add the new objects to the cloned . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法来确定 当前是否为窗体的父级。The following code example uses the method to determine if a is currently parented to the form. 如果要 的示例代码中的调用未返回 `null`，则代码将使用 方法克隆 的菜单结构。If the call in the example code to does not return `null`, the code then clones the menu structure of the using the method. 然后，该代码将 的新副本上的 属性设置为 true，以创建可用于支持从右向左文本的语言的 。The code then sets the property to true on the new copy of the to create a that can be used for languages that support right to left text. 此示例要求创建一个名为 `mainMenu1`的 。This example requires that you have a created that is named `mainMenu1`. [!code-cpp[Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Collapse As EventHandler

span.span: Occurs when the main menu collapses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `MainMenu1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MainMenu1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#483](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#483)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#483](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#483)]

summary.span: 处置由 占用的资源（内存除外）。

span.span: Disposes of the resources, other than memory, used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 后，必须释放对 的所有引用，以便垃圾回收将其占用的内存回收。After calling , you must release all references to the so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection. > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收调用 对象的析构函数之前，将不会释放 正在使用的资源。Otherwise, the resources the is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the object's destructor.

span.span: Returns if the is not currently hosted on a form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够确定特定 是否是窗体的父级。This property enables you to determine if a specific is parented to a form. 当窗体上使用了多个 对象并且需要确定窗体当前正在使用哪个对象时，通常会使用属性。The property is typically used when multiple objects are being used on a form and you need to determine which one is currently being used by a form. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法来确定 当前是否为窗体的父级。The following code example uses the method to determine if a is currently parented to the form. 如果要 的示例代码中的调用未返回 `null`，则代码将使用 方法克隆 的菜单结构。If the call in the example code to does not return `null`, the code then clones the menu structure of the using the method. 然后，该代码将 的新副本上的 属性设置为 true，以创建可用于支持从右向左文本的语言的 。The code then sets the property to true on the new copy of the to create a that can be used for languages that support right to left text. 此示例要求创建一个名为 `mainMenu1`的 。This example requires that you have a created that is named `mainMenu1`. [!code-cpp[Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: An that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类的 " 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft RightToLeft { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property RightToLeft As RightToLeft
public: virtual property System::Windows::Forms::RightToLeft RightToLeft { System::Windows::Forms::RightToLeft get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::RightToLeft value); };
member this.RightToLeft : System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置控件显示的文本是否从右向左显示。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the text displayed by the control is displayed from right to left.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过此属性，您的菜单可以支持从右到左书写的语言。This property enables your menus to support languages that are written from right to left. 如果将此属性设置为 `RightToLeft.Yes`，则菜单项文本将从右到左而不是从左到右的默认方法显示。When this property is set to `RightToLeft.Yes`, the menu item text will be displayed from right to left instead of the default left to right method. > [!NOTE] > 有关启用从右到左对齐对 Windows 窗体控件的影响的详细信息，请参阅 属性。For more information about how enabling right-to-left alignment affects Windows Forms controls, see the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法来确定 当前是否为窗体的父级。The following code example uses the method to determine if a is currently parented to the form. 如果要 的示例代码中的调用未返回 `null`，则代码将使用 方法克隆 的菜单结构。If the call in the example code to does not return `null`, the code then clones the menu structure of the using the method. 然后，示例代码将 属性设置为在 的新副本上 `RightToLeft.Yes`，以创建可用于支持从右向左文本的语言的 。The example code then sets the property to `RightToLeft.Yes` on the new copy of the to create a that can be used for languages that support right to left text. 此示例要求创建一个名为 `mainMenu1`的 。This example requires that you have a created that is named `mainMenu1`. [!code-cpp[Classic MainMenu.RightToLeft Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.RightToLeft Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MainMenu.RightToLeft Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.RightToLeft Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MainMenu.RightToLeft Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.RightToLeft Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 分配给该属性的值不是 枚举的有效成员。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 分配给窗体，则返回字符串包括 方法返回的类型和字符串。The return string includes the type and the string returned by the method if the is assigned to a form.
